text: L'Osservatore Romano is the official newspaper of the Holy See. It was first published in 1861. It is not used for official publications, which appear in Acta Apostolicae Sedis. L'Osservatore Romano is published daily, in Italian. There are also weekly or monthly editions in many other languages. ==Other websites== * The Holy See â€“ L'Osservatore Romano * L'Osservatore Romano site index * The origins of L'Osservatore Romano Category:Newspapers in Europe Category:Vatican City
title: L'Osservatore Romano
